alert.note: Alert for Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 3:30PM CDT until October 04 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Cotton County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wichita County in northern Texas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Grandfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Grandfield, Devol, and Loveland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
